title: Here's why tech giants want the Supreme Court to freeze Texas' social media law - NPR
content:
1. Here's why tech giants want the Supreme Court to freeze Texas' social media law  NPR
  2. Tech companies removed the Buffalo shooting manifesto. A Texas law could make that illegal.  POLITICO
  3. Texas attorney general Ken Paxton tells the Supreme Court state social media law should stand  The Washington Post
  4. Big Tech Takes Texas to the Supreme Court  The New York Times
  5. Tech groups ask Supreme Court to put Texas social media censorship law on hold  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Tech industry groups are urging the Supreme Court to block a Texas law barring social media companies from removing posts or banning users based on political viewpoints
